Package com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    Abstract base class for common features across multiple activities throughout the entire application life-cycle.
    BitmapUtils
    This is a Bitmap utility class which is used to load a Bitmap File into an ImageView with com.squareup.picasso.
    ColorPickerPreference
    This is a custom Preference to pick the font color for either question or answer.
    ContinueBoxPreference
    This is a custom Preference for the QNAPreferencesFragment, to allow the user to start the quiz from the saved progress remaining from the previous quiz; composed of:
      a TextView to notify the user that there is saved progress remaining, with details about the previous quiz a "Continue" button to start the quiz from the previously saved state
    CustomDialogFragment
    An abstract CustomDialog class which, rather than extending the Dialog base class directly, uses the AlertDialog sub-class with a custom layout.
    CustomExpandableListAdapter
    A custom adapter that links an ExpandableListView with the underlying data in order to provide access to the data of the children (categorized by groups), and also instantiate Views for the children and groups.
    CustomFontCache
    Loads a custom font from the assets folder.
    CustomFontHelper
    Sets a custom font based on the cached font from CustomFontCache.
    CustomFontTextView
    This class is the extended version of AppCompatTextView with only one difference: a custom text font.
    CustomValueFormatter
    Formats data set with BarData in QNASummaryBarChartBuilder.
    CustomXAxisValueFormatter
    X-axis IAxisValueFormatter for the QNASummaryBarChartBuilder class.
    CustomYAxisValueFormatter
    Y-axis IAxisValueFormatter for the QNASummaryBarChartBuilder class.
    EnviromentalConstants
    Defines the environmental constants for the entire app.
    ExpandableListHandler
    Sets and gets the ExpandableListView group and child data for the answer and question quiz types, as well as adjusts the ExpandableListView height.
    ExpandableListViewPreference
    Shows a Preference in the PreferenceScreen, in the QNAPreferencesFragment, composed of: two ExpandableListViews for question and answer type selection an ImageView swap icon in-between the two ExpandableListViews to interchange their values isDuplicate TextView notification to show that duplicate QNA type selection is not possible, which is made visible when ExpandableListViewPreference.isChildSelectorValid(int, int) returns false.
    LanguageSelectorPreference
    This is a custom Preference to select the UI language.
    PreferenceHelper
    Helper class which contains methods common to all Preferences.
    SeekBarPreference
    This is a custom Preference for a SeekBar, used to:
      select both the number of questions in the quiz select the number of answers per question
      In order to avoid extending two separate classes from this class for each of i-ii, XML attributes are used to handle the differences.
    SharedPreferencesKeys
    This class contains common static public constants that are compiled into bytecode (unlike the Android Resources) for easy access within the global scope.
    SingleFragmentActivity
    Generic abstract class to re-use fragments.
    ToastHelper
    Helper class to set up and show a custom Toast.
    TogglePreference
    This is a custom Switch Preference, used in the AppPreferencesFragment class.
    ToolBarActivity
    This is a common class for a Toolbar which is extended for all activities that display a Toolbar with a NavigationView Drawer.
